---
title: GitHub Authentication Demo
---

# GitHub Authentication

This runbook demonstrates the GitHubAuth block capabilities.

## Step 1: Authenticate to GitHub

<GitHubAuth 
  id="gh-auth"
  title="Connect to GitHub"
  description="Authenticate to access private repositories"
/>

## Step 2: Verify Authentication

<Command
  id="verify-auth"
  githubAuthId="gh-auth"
  title="Verify GitHub Access"
  path="./scripts/verify-auth.sh"
/>

## Step 3: Clone a Repository

<Inputs id="repo-config">
```yaml
variables:
  - name: repo_url
    type: string
    description: HTTPS URL of the repository to clone
    default: https://github.com/gruntwork-io/runbooks.git
  - name: clone_path
    type: string
    description: Local path to clone the repository into
    default: ./cloned-repo
```
</Inputs>

<Command
  id="clone-repo"
  githubAuthId="gh-auth"
  inputsId="repo-config"
  title="Clone Repository"
  command="rm -rf {{ .clone_path }} && git clone {{ .repo_url }} {{ .clone_path }}"
/>
